reviews.review_msg: He is a good teacher, despite what people say about him. But at the end, he is a nice person as long you don't mess around with him. He could be a bit mean occasionally, but I learn a lot of new things through this teacher.
He is by far the best prof ever. i took his class at SFU surrey and it was amazing.. I would highly recommend him.very fair and easy marker!!

Meguido Zola is one of the most inspiring people i've ever met. He is helpful, kind, supportive, and is interested in you as a person rather than seeing you as a student number. He is an amazing prof. TAKE HIS COURSE!!!!
He is amazing!
He was a good and fair prof. He helped those who needed it and didnt put up with any bull. Really makes you think outside the box!

Awesome prof, everyone hating on this guy clearly didn't do well in his class or is some book worm incapable of thinking outside of the box. It was a great class and I'd recommend it and the prof to anyone. A+++

Meguido is a very interesting character and can be both very kind and incredibly rude. He does choose favorites, but because the course work is so easy it really doesn't matter if you're one of them or not. easy GPA boost.
He's a great guy, his heart is in the right place, no I'm not hot looking. I enjoyed his humour.

Meguido is an incredibly wonderful professor. I come out of this class a happier and more confident person, hoping to become a teacher! Some may not get his sense of humor which can easily be mistaken as being rude but seriously, he's not from Canada, he finds sarcasm funny, deal with it! The books are wonderful and each class a joy to attend!
wonderful guy! would recommend all of his classes.
One of the best profs ever!!!
No Comments

I found his course to be the most life changing course I've ever taken - and I've taken A LOT!His philosophy around making the students, rather than the prof., the center of learning was the first I'd ever encountered and now has become my own as a future teacher.Since that class, he has become my mentor and I've learned an INCREDIBLE amount.
No Comments

Whoa!  Can't believe anyone has anything positive to say about Zola.  He is belittling,  vulgar, and outrageously unprofessional.  He will publicly humiliate students without flinching, and wouldn't offer clarity on an assignment if his life depended on it - after all, if he wrote it, we should all bow down to it.
No Comments
The previous poster's lack of proper grammar and syntax may explain why she never picked up on Zola's belittling sarcasm.
I have to agree with most of the others here.  He loves himself to death, but in fact he's an embarassment to the rest of the program and staff.  Avoid him like the plague.
ARROGANT, SARCASTIC AND PATRONIZING
It also helps if you are a pretty female!

The two positive comments here are completely out-to-lunch.  Zola is one of the most abusive, insane, uninspiring profs I have ever come across in my 3 degrees.  Wondering why there are over 40 ratings for him?  Or why he has a stack of complaints against him in the EDUC department? Stay away!

I disagree with all the negative comments about this professor.  He is an extremely helpful professor and has inspired me to become the same kind of person and teacher, its not his fault that some students misread the instructions of assignments and can't comprehend an open-ended assignment!

Having already done a BA, a B.Ed, and a Masters in Ed., I tool this course for "fun" using credits from having a student teacher. I encountered the worst academic experience of my life here. Zola is an endictment of tenure; he abuses his positio of power and comes across as a rude, sarcastic ass.

Completely agree! The guy's a total jerk! Don't both e-mailing him for help or support because he'll just reply with insults. I'm planning on filing a complaint against him but apparently its no use. He's been at SFU for so long that the univ won't do anything about these complaints.

HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE Prof. When I took this class over Distance Ed, we almost had a class revolt due to Meguido's lack of clarity on the assignments along with his grading technique(how does a B- equal 55?). When a few of us tried to email him for help, he responded with insults and threats. AVOID!!!!
I found that he really picks favorites.
No Comments

Wow! I can't believe the negative comments about Meguido! He is one of my all time favourite profs.I LOVED his children's lit class, as well as his Language Arts class. He was also my mentor Prof for PDP, and I found him to be very supportive & inspiring.
No Comments
A bias and unprofessional sorry excuse of a professor!!! His distance ed course was the first and the LAST distance ed that I'll ever take. Total waste of time!
I think he only liked certain people in the class, especially ppl who are expressive and extroverted.  I don't think he ever knew my name while it was just a 20 ppl lecture.
Most haughty, officious professor that ever existed

Yes, people will complain about the instructor.  However, you must look past the person (if that's your issue) and appreciate the material taught.  Educ 465 is an awesome course and is very useful for any situation with kids.

Granted the class is VERY different from what I expected it to be, but it is entertaining nonetheless.  It's basically counselling.  I find Meguido to be very nice and a very happy man.  I enjoy this class thoroughly, and it is definetly an easy "A&q
As a practicing high school English teacher I found the course next to useless. Work load is onerous, irrelevant.

Meguido's class was interesting.  Definitly not how I pictured it.  We got to make our own journal to find our "true vocation."  I never found my true vocation, but had tons of fun making my journal.  Take his class if you want to learn differen

Was definitely an experience...no course outline, changed assignments and dates constantly, we were an "experiment" for him, he self-admitted.  He's also incredibly BOLD, so expect that! I was shocked the first day...but easy marks!
Pathetic. Unhelpful. Condescending. Vendictive. Mediocre (his publsihing record has no awards). I wish I had not taken his course.

The most sarcastic and ude instructor I have ever encountered.  He has his favourites, and everyone else-good luck.  Avoid this instructor at all costs!  Has a reputation among his peers for his pompous superiority.
not helpful at all! a pompous jerk. belittles his students, and is totally condescending.  if at all possible DONT take a class with this prof!
Total GPA booster...free ride and no pressure. Final is a group project..4 assignments, participation and attendance...easy "A"

meguido is a very interesting prof.  he has so many stories, and we talked about so many important issues in education.  the personal journal we were assigned was one of he best assignments i have ever done, although it was worth 50% of my grade.
No Comments
VERY unhelpful and unwilling to provide any clarity of his explainations
Prefers to argue rather than solve the problem. Should've been a lawyer instead.
Very unprofessional and not helpful.  If you value your sanity, stay away!
very helpful course. Excellent TA and good insturctor!
thinks he has some 'special' way of teaching -- what a joke! Avoid at all costs
Has unreal expectations for his students, he is not very helpful at all.
